basics.name: Florian Kalisch
basics.summary: Pro standards, con average. Developer with a love for data, Artificial Intelligence, Neo4j, Blockchain, VR, and good conversations.

work.summary: Lead the Research and Development department, with the goal of unlocking current and future technologies to strengthen the company's competitiveness and shape the future of digital marketing.
highlights: Designing a strategy for tapping artificial intelligence and distributed ledger technology.
Development and implementation of an agile process model for project planning and management of complex, application-oriented research projects
Design and implementation of a scalable and cost-efficient data lake architecture based on Amazon Web Services
Advising NOZ Digital GmbH on the use of machine learning techniques
Advising management on the procedural design of transactions in the context of M&A projects
Preparation of a detailed guideline for technical due diligence

work.summary: Opening up the innovation area of voice apps
highlights: Design and implementation of the "Marketing Guru" voice app for MSO Digital using the following technology stack: JOVO Framework, AWS Lambda, AWS API Gateway, AWS DynamoDB, PHP and MySQL.
Giving lectures on the topic of Voice User Interfaces at the Osnabrück University of Applied Sciences
Design of a voice concept for a client
Facebook based job listings for Meyer & Meyer
Implementation of an AngularJS, PHP and MySQL based budget table
Implementation of an AngularJS, PHP and MySQL based solution for the creation of recurring JIRA tasks.
Design of a SaaS dashboard for publishers in a team and sole implementation of data sourcing and data visualization of Facebook data
Design of a software architecture for the migration of a customized Salesforce instance and implementation of the architecture using PHP and MySQL
Administration and support of the Enterprise Collaboration Platform Google Apps for Work
Management of the entire CRM area of MSO Digital
Adaptation and further development of the Salesforce Sales Cloud of MSO Digital
Strategic consulting for the Salesforce implementation for a client
Design and implementation of Salesforce dashboards
Design and implementation of a web service for MDH AG, for the validation of contact form data and subsequent transfer to Salesforce

work.summary: Master-Thesis: Automated individualization in One-2-One Recruiting
highlights: Definition of the research questions
Requirements analysis
Design of the system-architecture
Building a skill graph

Definition of Cypher-Queries

work.summary: Work on subsections to develop a multi-resolution display.
Bachelor-Thesis: Basics for the development of a multi-resolution display
highlights: Evaluation of algorithms for edge and vertex detection, as well as prototypical implementations
Verification of the algorithms by using a real experimental setup for the measurement of 3D projections

work.summary: Further development of the applications created in my internship semester as well as support for them.

During my internship semester, I was able to participate in the EU research project TrainALL. I designed and programmed a C++ API for recording driving simulation data, created a database design for capturing metadata and was allowed to present the project results in Stockholm.
highlights: Performance testing of database systems
Conception of a C++ API for the recording of driving data
Design of a database for the management of driving data and related metadata
Conception of a web application (based on the Spring framework)
Presentation of the project status at an international project meeting in Stockholm
Writing of a 70 page report in English language

highlights: Database development with the DBMS Intersystems Caché
Development with Caché Server Pages
Application development with Visual Basic

education.description: Software Architecture, Data Warehouse, Artificial intelligence, Business Software, Model Driven Architecture
Database applications, image processing, scientific computing
Started in the last diploma program and transferred to the bachelor's program.

projects.name: Nutritional optimization
projects.summary: This project is a private side project and has the objective to calculate the optimal ingredients for all meals of a day. In order for the ingredients to be considered optimal, they must fulfill two conditions: 1) they must cover the minimum values for nutrients specified by the German Nutrition Society and thus be beneficial to health 2) they must be the ones that have the lowest total weight among all possible foods and combinations. For this purpose, I scraped nutritional data and formulated the optimization problem as a linear system of equations, which I solved using the Python framework PuLP. Furthermore, I set up confidence intervals for the weight of the vegetables found, so that weighing the vegetables can be omitted.

projects.name: Dynamic online resume
projects.summary: After discovering the awesome project JSON Resume on GitHub, which defines a data format for a resume, I was looking for a way to generate an online resume / portfolio from it. After not finding a satisfactory solution, I developed one myself using React.js.
